column4: I just did software updates and whenever I login now I have no mouse cursor, I can see everything and use everything including my mouse and keyboard but just don't get a cursor. I've managed to "blindly" install XCHAT and connect here... Anyone have any idea how I can fix this?
Right click the desktop, with nothing open and choose change desktop background, then when that window opens, choose your theme, then customize, then change your mouse cursor.
